revision.text:
{{Infobox battle item |name = Soul Dew |image = [[File:Soul Dew.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Soul Dew''. |location =
*[[Roaming Pokémon|Hoenn]] }} == Description == The '''Soul Dew''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to Latios and Latias. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 50%. == Acquisition == {{ItemPrice/head‎|Evolution items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Hoenn]]|[[Rare_Hold_Items|Rare Hold Item]] drop from Latios and Latias ''(Base 1/15 chance to drop)*''}} |} |} *Note: Using the [[Dowsing Machine]] increases the chances of obtaining Soul Dew to 1/10.

{{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
revision.comment: Updating to match new version of source page
